Take it to talk sam. The Nolan Square is a theory, not a "fact" and since this is not an article on libertarianism opening the "definition" section with a libertarian view of fascism is POV.
rv to last edit by hadal, do not delete factually accurate content
See TALK. The Nolan chart is hardly a neutral standard that can be used to assess ideologies. It says a lot about libertarianism (and libertarian self-perception) but is not useful otherwise.
